ygData.subject: Re: Neo Decepticons

Rampage snarled, but he had no choice. "What does that have to do with
anything?" He looked down at the damaged Mutate. "I have a buisness
proposition, one that your logic can't refuse." He waited for a reply,
looking down again at his friend. "Soon, you will be repaired, I
guarantee it."
